note.p: Burial: In the chancel of Great Cressingham church
Education: Pembroke College, Cambridge; BA (1687), MA (1690), DD (1707)

Career: Fellow of Pembroke (1688); ordained priest (1689); Professor of Divinity, Gresham College (1691-1728); Vice-Chancellor of Cambridge University (1707-1708); Master of Pembroke (1707-1728); Vicar of Chrishall, Essex (1719); Rector of Salle, Norfolk (1720-1725); Rector of Great Cressingham, Norfolk (1725-1728); Chaplain to William III
Authority: Approximate year of birth from Hunter.
